headline: Wow, That's Fast! Instant DNS Updates and More...
keywords: DNS, Product News, Speed & Reliability, Reliability
description: At CloudFlare, we're constantly trying to make things faster. To give you a sense, at our current scale, for every 1 millisecond (1/1000th of a second) we remove from requests through our network, we save a lifetime (70 years) worth of time every year.
